thread.title: 12 M Yacht Development Foundation Inc.
thread.title_full: POP Yachts reviewed by 12 M Yacht Development Foundation Inc.

author: 12 M Yacht Development Foundation Inc.
title: 12 M Yacht Development Foundation Inc.
text:
Nafis was exceptional and a pleasure to work with on all counts regarding follow through on the sale of our historic open Transom 40' IOR Racing Sloop originally built for Team Canada to compete in the Admirals Cup in England and I would highly recommend him and the fulfillment crew at POP yachts to any serious seller with no reservations!
Ragards, Patrick J. Sikorski
ExDir/Trustee- 12m Yacht Development Foundatiom
Greenwich, CT. USA
